rocTree

ROC-guided survival trees and forests

Development

The package is under active development.

Installation

You can install rocTree from GitHub with:

## install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stc04003/rocTree")

Online documentations

Online document includes:

  • Package vignette on simulating data used in examples.
  • Package vignette on fitting time-invariant survival tree.
